get.summary: Get a listing of the Analytics.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Change the Default Record Count. If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Change the Default Offset of the Query. If not found, 0 will be used.

post.summary: Store a newly created Analytic in storage

get.summary: Display the specified Analytic

put.summary: Update the specified Analytic in storage

delete.summary: Remove the specified Analytic from storage

success.description: Log the user out (Invalidate the token).

message.description: Log the user out (Invalidate the token).

get.summary: Forget password request.
Get a listing of the Categories.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Acceptable values are 10 and 20, 10 will return only Audio (Music) Categories, 20 will return only Video Categories. If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: with_media
parameters.description: Add media records in along with data. If not found only category objects are returned

parameters.name: media_is_featured
parameters.description: Media Filter: Include media records that are marked as featured. If set to 0, include media records that are not marked as featured. If not found, do not apply any condition on featured param.

parameters.name: with_playlists
parameters.description: Add playlist records in along with data. If not found only category objects are returned

parameters.name: playlist_is_featured
parameters.description: Playlist Filter: Include playlist records that are marked as featured. If set to 0, include playlist records that are not marked as featured. If not found, do not apply any condition on featured param.

parameters.name: playlist_parent_id
parameters.description: Filter playlist by parent_id. If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: playlist_parent_only
parameters.description: Get parent playlists only. If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: playlist_child_only
parameters.description: Get child playlists only. If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: playlist_has_child
parameters.description: Filter playlist by child status, 1 will only include playlists that has children, 0 will only include playlist that does not have children. If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: exclude_empty
parameters.description: Acceptable values are 0 and 1, 1 will exclude all artists that does not have any songs selected in them, 0 will return all artists.

parameters.name: sort_by_songs
parameters.description: Sort all artists be song count desc.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Pass the property name you want to sort your response. If not found, Returns All Records in DB without sorting.

parameters.name: sortedBy
parameters.description: Pass 'asc' or 'desc' to define the sorting method. If not found, 'asc' will be used by default

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Change the Default Record Count. If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Change the Default Offset of the Query. If not found, 0 will be used.

parameters.description: Acceptable values are 0 and 1, 0 will return exclude featured media, 1 will return only featured media,. If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: category_id
parameters.description: Filter media with this category id. If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: playlist_id
parameters.description: Filter media with this playlist id. If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Filter media with this user id. If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter media with type. If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Pass the property name you want to sort your response. If not found, Returns All Records in DB without sorting.

parameters.name: sortedBy
parameters.description: Pass 'asc' or 'desc' to define the sorting method. If not found, 'asc' will be used by default

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Change the Default Record Count. If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Change the Default Offset of the Query. If not found, 0 will be used.

Get a listing of the Playlists.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Acceptable values are 10 and 20, 10 will return only Audio (Music) Playlists, 20 will return only Video Playlists. If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: parent_id
parameters.description: Filter playlist by parent_id. If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: category_id
parameters.description: Filter playlist by category_id. If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: parent_only
parameters.description: Get parent playlists only. If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: child_only
parameters.description: Get child playlists only. If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: has_child
parameters.description: Filter playlist by child status, 1 will only include playlists that has children, 0 will only include playlist that does not have children. If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: is_featured
parameters.description: Acceptable values are 0 and 1, 0 will return exclude featured playlists, 1 will return only featured playlists,. If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: is_protected
parameters.description: Acceptable values are 0 and 1, 0 will return only playlists that are not protected (User Created include Other Users), 1 will return only playlists that are protected (Only Admin Created) . If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: exclude_empty
parameters.description: Acceptable values are 0 and 1, 1 will exclude all playlists that does not have any songs selected in them, 0 will return all playlists.

parameters.name: sort_by_songs
parameters.description: Sort all playlists be song count desc.

parameters.name: is_mine
parameters.description: Return only playlists that are mine (Current User Created). If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: with_media
parameters.description: Return all playlists along with media records. If not found only playlists records are returned without media. This improves performance when dealing with playlists that have many media records included

parameters.name: updated_after
parameters.description: Return all playlists that are updated after the given time. If not found only playlists records are returned. This improves performance when getting updates frequently. Please use the updated_at as recieved from previous APIs or yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss for correct date comparison

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Change the Default Record Count. If not found, Returns All Records in DB.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Change the Default Offset of the Query. If not found, 0 will be used.

parameters.name: with_media
parameters.description: Return all playlists along with media records. If not found only playlists records are returned without media. This improves performance when dealing with playlists that have many media records included
